title: Autumn colours sweep across the West
caption: Autumn colours sweep across the West
desc: Few views are more striking than this one of the foliage in Colorado’s Uncompahgre Forest in the shadow of Chimney Rock. The spire and its neighbour Courthouse Mountain dominate the landscape here year-round, but the changing colours make this area - and drives along the region’s well-known Million Dollar Highway - even more scenic.
copyright: Chimney Rock and Uncompahgre National Forest, Colorado (© Cory Marshall/Tandem Stills + Motion)
